properties.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 8 at 3:37AM CST until February 9 at 3:00PM CST by NWS Sioux Falls SD
properties.description:
* WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 8
inches with locally higher amounts possible. Winds gusting as
high as 35 mph.

* WHERE...Lincoln and Lyon Counties.

* WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to 3 PM CST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow
could significantly reduce visibility.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Given the banded nature of the expected
snowfall, small shifts in the storm track could result in
additional changes to expected snowfall as well as drastic
variations in snow amounts over short distances.
properties.instruction:
If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in
your vehicle in case of an emergency.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 3 PM CST SUNDAY
